roleset.name: provide money for

example.name: finance-v: transitive
example.text: Japanese companies have financed small and medium - sized US firms for years .

propbank.arg: small and medium - sized US firms

example.name: finance-v: with money
example.text: A host of electronics firms in California 's Silicon Valley were financed with trading - company capital .

propbank.arg: A host of electronics firms in California 's Silicon Valley

example.name: finance-n: Arg2 as subject
example.text: Junk bonds are often used to finance restructurings and takeovers .

example.name: finance-n: No money mention
example.text: The bank 's finance of his house took him six years to pay back .

example.name: finance-n: NP fragment
example.text: ... the shift from government finance of health facilities to patients paying out - of - pocket ;

example.name: finance-n: With Money
example.text: Thanks to the public - private partnership , the utilisation of EU funds should also increase , as the opportunity of joint finance of projects with EU funds is also envisaged .

example.name: finance-n: Args 1 & 3 only
example.text: It said it will also offer buyers the option of finance as low as 6.9 % on 24 - month loans .

example.name: financing-n: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: It allows Cuba to buy food and medicine from the United States for the first time since 1962 , but the bill restricts US financing of such sales and also continues a US travel ban to Cuba .

example.name: financing-n: args 3, 1
example.text: It said it will also offer buyers the option of financing as low as 6.9 % on 24 - month loans .

example.name: financing-n: args0, 1
example.text: So not only will the invasion create British jobs , take people off the streets , provide invaluable battle - field experience and be self - financing .... it could actually be PROFIT MAKING !

roleset.note: FINANCE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'finance' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus (from finance.01-v)
FINANCE-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry finance.01, OntoNotes sense grouping finance.01; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire. (from finance.01-n)
FINANCING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, finance-n.01. No VNcls. (from financing.01-n)
FINANCING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, financing-n.01, fincance-v.01. (from financing.01-j)
Roles match the noun, which includes and extra arg (3) that the verb doesn't have. (from financing.01-j)

roleset.name: buy using someone else's money

example.name: finance-v: car payments
example.text: Buyers financed part of a car purchase through the General Motors Acceptance Corp.

propbank.arg: through the General Motors Acceptance Corp.

roleset.note: FINANCE-V NOTES: These rolesets can be hard to distinguish. (from finance.02-v)

roleset.name: relating to finances

example.name: financial-j
example.text: So long as depression continued , the issue was financial and the two had a common enemy ; the banker .

roleset.note: FINANCIAL-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. Related to finance-v, etc (from financial.01-j)
